title: Danica Patrick praises Aaron Rodgers for his perfect passer rating
text:
They confirmed their relationship nearly two years ago.

And Danica Patrick made sure to sing praises of her boyfriend Aaron Rodgers after he secured his first-ever perfect passer rating on Sunday after the Green Bay Packers historic win against the Oakland Raiders.

The 37-year-old athlete wrote that Aaron is also a 'great human' off the field as she celebrated his outstanding accolades as the team's first quarterback to receive the coveted score.

Hard work! Danica Patrick made sure to sing praises of her boyfriend Aaron Rodgers after he secured his first-ever perfect passer rating on Sunday after the Green Bay Packers historic win against the Oakland Raiders

'While Aaron’s greatness is measured and very very impressive on the field, he should also be known for the great human he is off the field,' she wrote.

Danica's regularly spotted at Lambeau Field for games and practices, and makes sure to bring a cheering squad for Aaron.

'Every weekend there is a group of amazing people that fly from far and wide to support him, some new friends (many are my old friends) but most he has had for decades,' she added.

Fans forever: The 37-year-old athlete wrote that Aaron is also a 'great human' off the field as she celebrated his outstanding accolades as the team's first quarterback to receive the coveted score

'Yesterday was one of those days where there was so much to celebrate beyond just being together. Perfect passer rating. Fastest QB to reach 350 TD in history. Also, a highly ranked game in passing yards and in TDs.'

Danica joked about Aaron's 'hotness' and wrote that she was a 'lucky girl' to be on this journey with him.

His received a 158.3 rating from the game where he completed 25-of-31 passes for 49 yards and five touchdowns, with the Packers winning 42-24.

Go Pack Go! Danica's regularly spotted at Lambeau Field for games and practices, and makes sure to bring a cheering squad for Aaron

Rodgers is currently playing his 15th year in the NFL and with the Green Bay Packers.

Danica and Aaron met in 2012 at the ESPY Awards, but remained friends until just last year when they sparked a romance.

She previously dated fellow driver Rickey Stenhouse Jr. while he was in a relationship with Olivia Munn for three years.
description: The 37-year-old athlete wrote that Aaron is also a 'great human' off the field as she celebrated his outstanding accolades as the team's first quarterback to receive the coveted score.
